trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were 2 other sightings in New York on or around September 1st 2011
divs: sighting detailsthe object was heading se over the 11203 area code. it could be a plane but for how bright the light was it should have been close enough to emit engine noise. a plane flew near the same area and it's foward light was dimmer and the plane was further and i heard it engine noise slightly. also to note the light was steady with no flashing red\green lights. just wanted to post just in case someone saw the same thing.
